pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or later
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
